## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                           | Type                             | Default            |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `action`         | `action`          | Native form attributes                                                                                                                                | `string`                         | `''`               |
| `bcolor`         | `bcolor`          | Optional border/box styling                                                                                                                           | `string`                         | `''`               |
| `bradius`        | `bradius`         |                                                                                                                                                       | `number`                         | `undefined`        |
| `bstyle`         | `bstyle`          |                                                                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `''`               |
| `bwidth`         | `bwidth`          |                                                                                                                                                       | `number`                         | `undefined`        |
| `fieldset`       | `fieldset`        | Render a fieldset wrapper (with optional legend)                                                                                                      | `boolean`                        | `false`            |
| `formId`         | `form-id`         |                                                                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `''`               |
| `formLayout`     | `form-layout`     | Layout + identity used by slotted children                                                                                                            | `"" \| "horizontal" \| "inline"` | `''`               |
| `legend`         | `legend`          |                                                                                                                                                       | `boolean`                        | `false`            |
| `legendPosition` | `legend-position` |                                                                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `'left'`           |
| `legendTxt`      | `legend-txt`      |                                                                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `'Add Title Here'` |
| `method`         | `method`          |                                                                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `''`               |
| `outsideOfForm`  | `outside-of-form` | If true, do not render a <form>. Inputs placed outside the form can still read formId via closest('form-component') and set their own form attribute. | `boolean`                        | `false`            |
| `styles`         | `styles`          | Additional inline styles to append (CSS string)                                                                                                       | `string`                         | `''`               |
